headline: 4 Low-Beta Defensive Stocks to Buy as Consumer Sentiment Plummets
summary: ETR, CNP, JBSS and UVV stand out as consumer sentiment sinks, with low beta, rising earnings estimates and a steady dividend drawing defensive investors.
